item.title: Why Did MBRX Stock Plummet Over 25% Today?
item.description: Moleculin Biotech will implement a 1-for-25 reverse stock split of its common stock, effective December 1.

item.title: Charles Gillespie Raises Ownership In Gambling.com – ‘Buying Back Stocks At Current Levels Is Unbelievably Attractive’
item.description: In a post on X, the CEO and Co-founder described the purchase as a chance to secure shares he believes are undervalued, citing a disconnect between cu...

item.title: Morgan Stanley's Michael Gapen Predicts US Economy To Return To ‘Modest Growth’ In 2026
item.description: The economist predicts the U.S. economy will grow at 1.8% in 2026 and 2% in 2027.

item.title: DDC Stock Gains After Company Adds 100 Bitcoin To Treasury – Total Holdings Hit 1,183 BTC
item.description: Norma Chu, the founder, chairwoman and CEO of DDC, said the company was making a long-term play.

item.title: Grindr Stockholders Zage And Lu Withdraw $18-Per-Share Take-Private Bid After Committee Ends Talks
item.description: Zage and Lu said that the Special Committee indicated that this determination was made due to uncertainty around the financing for the proposal.
